classType: Party Buff - Crit Rate + Crit Damage

pros: Has a lot of innate %Ignore DEF
Long ranged attacks and hard-hitting attacks with Piercing Arrow and Snipe
Hookshot allows you to freely move around the map
Arrow Illusion draws enemy aggro from you
Sharp Eyes provides %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage to party members
cons: Does not deal increased damage if there are multiple enemies around
Damage fluctuates depending on distance with Rangefinder

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Aggressive Resistance, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Dodge Chance: +30%
Crit Damage: +23% + (20% when Reckless Hunt: Crossbow is active)
Final Damage: +(up to 40% from Rangefinder) + (up to 20% from Last Man Standing)
Ignore DEF: +25% + (up to 30% from Rangefinder) + (up to 50% from Vital Hunter)

buffInfo.summons: , (20s cd), (120 - 105s cd), (60s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (90s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: , (180s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Archer to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Bowman, long-ranged and controlled' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Bowman, talk to Athena Pierce to accept a quest called 'Trail of the Crossbowman'. Completing the quest will make you a Crossbowman and you will be on the path to a Marksman. Crossbowman is the 2nd job of Marksman

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Piercing Arrow - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Snipe - Cooldown Cutter, Reinforce, and Boss Rush

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Arrow Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Damage: 295%, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Shoots an arrow that when hit, damages nearby enemies

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, double-tapping the Up Arrow Key will perform a vertical jump
Double-tapping the Down Arrow Key will allow you to descend quickly

primary.name: Critical Shot
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Archery Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Range +120, Movement Speed +30, Max Movement Speed Increased to 160

primary.name: Iron Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 450%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that pierces through enemies

primary.name: Rangefinder
primary.shortDesc: Based on distance 200, when closer than 18 the Ignore Defense increases by 3% up to a max of 20%. The farther the distance, final damage increases by 4% up to a max of 30%
primary.desc: Based on your distance to an enemy, you gain increased %Ignore DEF the closer an enemy is and increased %Final Damage the further an enemy is

primary.name: Judge Distance
primary.shortDesc: Cooldown: 1.5 sec
primary.desc: When activated, allows you to tell the distance from enemies

primary.name: Net Toss
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Attack up to 8 enemies with 215% damage 2 times. 100% chance to slow enemies for 4 sec. For bosses, it lasts for half as long and their movement speed is reduced by 50%\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Leap backward while launching out a net
details:
Attack slows enemies hit
  • Effect is halved for bosses

primary.name: Crossbow Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Crossbow Attack Speed increased for 300 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Soul Arrow: Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Attack Power: +30, Duration: 300 sec, able to attack without using arrows

primary.name: Crossbow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Final Attack : Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% Final Attack damage.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Explosive Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 18, attack up to 8 enemies with 700% damage. 200% additional damage to the first target enemy
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that spreads to and damages nearby enemies
details: Initial target takes increased %Damage from the attack

primary.name: Dragon's Breath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Max Enemies Hit: 9, Damage: 525%
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Frostprey
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, summon Frostprey for 220 sec. Attacks up to 4 enemies at once with 390% damage. Freezes for 3 sec\n[Passive Effects: Increases Defense by 30%]
primary.desc: Summons a Frostprey that fights alongside you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect
[Passive]: Permanently increases %DEF

primary.name: Hookshot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, after attacking with 170% damage, moves by passing through enemies\n[Passive Effects: Max HP increases by 40%]
primary.desc: Fires a hook that targets the furthest enemy in range and pulls you towards it
details: If there is a Arrow Illusion (4th Job) in range, holding the Down Arrow Key while using Hookshot will pull you towards it
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Max HP

primary.name: Painkiller
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Clear Status and make you immune to it for 1 sec, Cooldown: 300 sec\n[Passive Effect: Increase Abnormal Status Resistance by 20 and Elemental Resistance by 20%]
primary.desc: Clears all Abnormal Statuses and makes you immune to them briefly
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Reckless Hunt: Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: Reduces Avoidability. Critical Damage: +20%
primary.desc: When toggled, reduces %Avoidability but increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Mortal Blow
primary.shortDesc: Grants a 10% chance when attacking to deal 20% increased damage to an enemy. 1% Max HP & MP recovered when triggered.
primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attack to gain increased %Damage
details: Restores some %Max HP/MP when the effect is triggered

primary.name: Aggressive Resistance
primary.shortDesc: When attacking, for 8 sec, 20% of damage dealt will be converted into a barrier. Reduces 60% of damage taken. Able to reduce damage up to 65% of Max HP
primary.desc: When attacking, you create a shield based on a portion of your damage dealt that absorbs a portion of incoming damage

primary.name: Evasion Boost
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 30%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be criticals.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Whenever you dodge an attack, all your attacks will be Critical Hits briefly

primary.name: Marksmanship
primary.shortDesc: Monster DEF Ignored: 25%, Damage: +15%

primary.name: Piercing Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 42, Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Pierced: 6, Number of Attacks: 4, final damage increases by 15% for every pierce and damage is doubled. Arrow Fragment bounces off the first enemy hit, dealing 300% damage 4 times up to 2 enemies.
primary.desc: Fires an arrow that pierces through enemies
details: %Final Damage of attack increased for each enemy pierced

primary.name: Snipe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 465%, Number of Attacks: 9, Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%, Bonus Critical Rate: 100%\n Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Fires a powerful arrow at a single enemy
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Arrow Illusion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, summon Arrow Illusion with 100000 HP for 30 sec\nDeal 200% to surrounding enemies. After pulling in, Stun at 70% chance for 4 sec. When damage is taken, reflect 1200% of damage.\nCooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Creates a pulsating arrow that pulls in and damages nearby enemies
details: If you get hit while Arrow Illusion is active, you deal a counterattack

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Crossbow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +8%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Illusion Step
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity: +80, Avoidability: +30% chance, Damage taken reduced by 20%.

primary.name: Bolt Surplus
primary.shortDesc: Increases the number of attacks for all multi-hit skills by 1. Rangefinder's Max Ignore Defense increases by 30%. Final Damage Boost increases by 40%
primary.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack of multi-hit skills (by +1) and increases the strength of

primary.name: Last Man Standing
primary.shortDesc: When the skill hits a single target, if there are no monsters within 80 units of the enemy's left and right, final damage increases by 20%
primary.desc: When a skill hits a single target with no enemies nearby, you deal increased %Final Damage

primary.name: Vital Hunter
primary.shortDesc: 10% Enemy DEF Ignored at minimum distance. Increases by 4% per 40 distance. Max Enemy DEF Ignored Bonus: 50%
primary.desc: Based on your distance from an enemy, you gain increased %Ignore DEF the further you are from an enemy

hyperActive.name: Bullseye Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 30 sec, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +10%, Monster DEF Ignored: +20%, Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 90 sec

hyperActive.name: High Speed Shot
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 9, Enemies Hit: 12\nCooldown: 15 sec
hyperActive.desc: Fires a deadly arrow at multiple enemies in range

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Perfect Shot
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 2400%, Number of Attacks: 9, Critical Shot Count: 7
Damage Range: 15% - 100% depending on enemy's proximity to the center of your sights, Enemy DEF Ignored: 100%
Duration: 12 sec, invincible for 2 sec after skill ends
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Allows you to aim and shoot arrows at enemies using your mouse
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
Damage is based on an enemy's proximity to the center of your sights
Use the Left Mouse Button to attack and Right Mouse Button to cancel the Skill
You are invincible while in Perfect Shot and briefly after the skill ends

fifthMain.name: Split Shot
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 800, Duration: 60 sec. Landing a hit with Piercing Arrow or Snipe causes your arrow to split and attack up to 10 enemies, dealing 1200% damage 5 times.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, when using or , a burst of arrows will fire in front of you

fifthMain.name: Surge Bolt
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 750, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 10. Deals 1500% damage after focus is complete
Additional Monster DEF Ignored: 50%, Additional Critical Rate: +100%
Max Focus Duration: 10 sec
Cooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Charges up a powerful arrow that is shot fired when released
details:
Holding the Skill Key will charge the Skill
  • You can use other Skills while you charge
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
The arrow grows as you charge and gains increased %Damage

fifthMain.name: Repeating Crossbow Cartridge
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 750, Duration: 60 sec, Usable Cartridges: 8, Full Burst Shot: MP Cost: 150, Cartridge Used: 1, Damage: 600%, Number of Arrow Attacks: 9, Arrows Fired: 4, DEF Ignored: 25%, Critical Rate: 100%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When active, pressing the Skill Key fires a special arrow forward
details: Up to 7 arrows can be fired maximum while the buff is active

meta: Marksman is a DEX archer class part of the Explorers class group. Marksman attack from a distance and use powerful precise shots to take down their enemies
